deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title CampaignLifecycle
 @dev This contract manages the campaign's lifecycle calls and state changes.

devdoc.details: This contract manages the campaign's lifecycle calls and state changes.

addCampaignOrTopUp(string,address,uint25.details: Add a new campaign or top up an existing campaign

params.amount: The amount to be allocated to the campaign from the campaigner's balance.
params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address

params.newCampaigner: Address of the user having campaigner role to be used here

addFungibleCampaign(address,string,addre.details: Add a new campaign for fungible tokens or top up an existing campaign

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.tokenAmount: The amount of tokens to be allocated to the campaign
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format

adjustTotalFungibleReward(address,addres.details: Distribute fungible tokens to the campaigner

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format
params.tokenTotalAmount: The total amount of tokens to be distributed

adjustTotalReward(address,string,uint256.details: Distribute HBAR tokens to the campaigner

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.totalAmount: The total amount of tokens to be distributed

associateToken(address,bool).details: Adds or removes a token from the whitelist.

params.isWhitelisted: Boolean flag to mark the token as whitelisted or not.

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaignExpiryTime: The expiry time of the campaign in seconds

closeFungibleCampaign(string,uint256).details: Close a campaign with fungible tokens

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaignExpiryTime: The expiry time of the campaign in seconds

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address

expiryFungibleCampaign(address,string,ad.details: Expiry a campaign with fungible tokens campaigns only

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format

getAllWhitelistedTokens().details: Retrieves all whitelisted addresses for a given token type.

returns._0: An array of addresses that are whitelisted for the given token type.

getCampaignBalance(string).details: Balance held by the user to see.

getFungibleTokenBalance(address,address).details: Retrieves the balance of a fungible token for a specific campaigner.

params.campaigner: Address of the campaigner's solidity address.
params.tokenId: Solidity address used for the account.

returns.res: The balance of the fungible token.

getHbarBalance(address).details: Balance holded by the user to see.

isTokenWhitelisted(address).details: Checks if a specific token address is whitelisted for a given token type.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to check.

returns._0: Boolean flag indicating if the token is whitelisted.

devdoc.title: CampaignLifecycle
